name: FuzzBall's Adventure
description:
FuzzBall’s Adventure is a 2D platformer made just for you to enjoy. Developed by a solo developer using Unity and Photoshop. This unique game will tickle your funny bone with it’s quirky sound effects while challenging your skills as a gamer though its challenging levels and enemy’s.

Why are you still reading this description hurry up and click download!

How to Play:

  • Left & Right Buttons - Moves the Player
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • Click On-Screen Buttons to Navigate Through Menu's

Game Developer: Katie Hill
